question: AWS IoT Greengrass and ____________  automatically integrate with AWS IoT Device Defender to provide security metrics from the devices for evaluation.
If you’re already using Amazon EC2 Auto Scaling to dynamically scale your Amazon EC2 instances, you can now combine it with ____________  to scale additional resources for other AWS services.
hint: Scale Multiple Resources to Meet Demand

question: Amazon Elastic Inference Amazon Elastic Inference allows you to attach low-cost GPU-powered acceleration to Amazon EC2 and ____________  instances to reduce the cost of running deep learning inference by up to 75%.
hint: Build, Train, and Deploy Machine Learning Models at Scale

question: If you’re already using Amazon EC2 Auto Scaling to dynamically scale your Amazon EC2 instances, you can now combine it with ____________  to scale additional resources for other AWS services.
hint: Scale Multiple Resources to Meet Demand

question: With a few clicks in the ____________ , you can create an API that acts as a “front door” for applications to access data, business logic, or functionality from your back-end services, such as workloads running on Amazon EC2, code running on AWS Lambda, or any web application.

For higher levels of protection against attacks targeting your applications running on Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (EC2), Elastic Load Balancing (ELB), Amazon CloudFront, and Amazon Route 53 resources, you can subscribe to ____________  Advanced.

If you’re already using ____________  Auto Scaling to dynamically scale your ____________  instances, you can now combine it with AWS Auto Scaling to scale additional resources for other AWS services.

In addition to the network and transport layer protections that come with Standard, ____________  Advanced provides additional detection and mitigation against large and sophisticated DDoS attacks, near real-time visibility into attacks, and integration with AWS WAF, a web application firewall.
AWS IoT Greengrass and ____________  automatically integrate with AWS IoT Device Defender to provide security metrics from the devices for evaluation.
When you use AWS Shield Standard with Amazon CloudFront and ____________ , you receive comprehensive availability protection against all known infrastructure (Layer 3 and 4) attacks.
